mapper.select:
SELECT USER_ID AS userId , USER_NM AS userNm , USER_EMAIL_ADDR AS userEmailAddr , USER_ENT_MEDM_CD AS userEntMedmCd , USER_ENT_DT AS userEntDt , USER_APRV_DT AS userAprvDt , DRMT_STAT_CHAN_DT AS drmtStatChanDt , USER_WTHD_DT AS userWthdDt , LAST_LOGIN_DT AS lastLoginDt , FRST_REGP_ID AS frstRegpId , FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt , LAST_MODP_ID AS lastModpId , LAST_MODF_DT AS lastModfDt FROM KCURE_COM_USER WHERE 1=1
AND USER_ID = #{id}

SELECT USER_ID AS userId , USER_NM AS userNm , USER_EMAIL_ADDR AS userEmailAddr , USER_ENT_MEDM_CD AS userEntMedmCd , USER_ENT_DT AS userEntDt , USER_APRV_DT AS userAprvDt , DRMT_STAT_CHAN_DT AS drmtStatChanDt , USER_WTHD_DT AS userWthdDt , LAST_LOGIN_DT AS lastLoginDt , FRST_REGP_ID AS frstRegpId , FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt , LAST_MODP_ID AS lastModpId , LAST_MODF_DT AS lastModfDt FROM KCURE_COM_USER ORDER BY USER_NM DESC
